nodes.text: The University of Desultori was an institution on Desultori. Famed author Aanxi Raanxi Laanxi chaired four subcommittees on creative procrastinating at the university.

The University of Desultori was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
